# Base Tables Change Log

## [4.1.0] - 2018-12-11
### Base Tables V4.1.0
- Removed gulp and replaced with webpack
- Updated scripts in package.json
- Updated documentation
- Version bump for index.scss/less and package.json

## [4.0.0] - 2018-04-09
### Base Tables V4.0.0
- Added tables for all breakpoints
